word: G296 - ἄμφοδον - ámphodon - am'-fod-on - Where two ways meet

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Where two ways meet
properly, a road around anything, a street
Part(s) of speech: Noun Neuter / பெயர்ச்சொல் (அஃறிணை)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From the base of G297 and G3598; a fork in the road: - where two ways meet.
